articles.description: The former NRL star has ended a tumultuous year with a momentous personal announcement.
articles.content:
Jarryd Hayne has announced his engagement to girlfriend, Amellia Bonnici. Pic: Instagram
Jarryd Hayne has signed off on a challenging 2020 with some wonderful personal news, after announcing that he… [+3415 chars]
